text:
From my understanding, once you install October 2023 updates, the registry entries are now pointless, the code ignores anything you set and will deny auth if not compliant. October 10, 2023 - Full Enforcement phase The Windows updates released on or after October 10, 2023 will do the following: * Removes support for the registry subkey KrbtgtFullPacSignature. * Removes support for Audit mode. * All service tickets without the new PAC signatures will be denied
 authentication.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] October updates and Kerberos
